articles.title: Experts cast doubt on the benefit of exercise for arthritis patients
articles.description: A new study questions the ‘universal promotion’ of physical activity for people with the condition
articles.content:
Physical activity may have little to no impact on alleviating the symptoms of a common form of arthritis, a new study has suggested.

articles.title: NHS backs new diabetes drugs to cut early deaths by 17,000
articles.description: In a transformation of treatment, millions more type 2 patients will be offered flozins or GLP-1 injections such as Mounjaro and Ozempic
articles.content:
Research shows diabetes patients on SGLT-2 inhibitors are 24 per cent less likely to die early. Nice said the recommendation would prevent 17,000 deaths over the next three years in the UK.

articles.title: After Decades of Elimination, Measles Returns to Canada
articles.description: Canada’s loss of measles elimination status reveals how declining vaccination rates can quickly revive once-controlled diseases.
articles.content: In 1998, measles was officially eliminated in Canada, with the United States following two years later. However, two and a half decades later, the disease has resurfaced in the public spotlight with 1,912 cases in the US in 2025, compared to just 285... [6235 chars]

articles.title: Calgary family uses billboard in plea to find a kidney donor
articles.description: Having undergone treatment for cancer and getting the all-clear, the timing is now critical for Alice Pesta to receive another transplant.
articles.content:
A Calgary family in desperate need to save their wife and mother have turned to the public for help. As a last resort, they’ve put up a billboard hoping to find a kidney donor.

articles.title: Bird flu suspected as dead geese are found at multiple parks across New Jersey, officials say
articles.description: The cause of the geese deaths is suspected to be bird flu, officials said.
articles.content:
Large numbers of dead or dying geese have been found at parks across New Jersey in recent days.
